mapper.select: select * from Message where id in ( select MAX(id) from Message where status != '2' and from_id != 0 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) order by id DESC limit #{offset},#{rows}
select COUNT(m.maxId) from ( select MAX(id) as maxId from Message where status != '2' and from_id != 0 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) as m

select * from Message as m1 inner join( select id from Message where status != '2' and from_id != 0 and conversation_id = #{conversationId} order by id DESC limit #{offset},#{rows} ) as m2 where m1.id = m2.id order by m1.id DESC
select COUNT(id) from Message where status != '2' and from_id != 0 and conversation_id = #{conversationId}
